title: WTTF: T206 Walter Johnson Portrait (Centered; About a 1.5 to a 3; SGC Preferred)

posts.post_title: WTTF: T206 Walter Johnson Portrait (Centered; About a 1.5 to a 3; SGC Preferred)
posts.post_content:
Hello, I'm looking to trade for a decent T206 Walter Johnson Portrait.

Centered SGC 2.5 would be ideal. 

I have some graded T206 Hof's, and other cards also for trade.

Feel free to PM if interested 

Thanks
